item.title: Owner of Swiss ski bar held in custody after deadly New Year's Eve fire
item.description: Jacques Moretti is being held as a potential flight risk, Swiss media reports say.

item.title: US seizes another oil tanker linked to Venezuela, officials say
item.description: The tanker, the Olina, is on multiple countries' sanctions list and is "suspected of carrying embargoed oil", US officials said.

item.title: Changes to Elon Musk's AI Grok 'insulting' to victims, says No 10
item.description: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

item.title: Trump warns of more Nigeria strikes if Christians 'continue to be killed'
item.description: The US president made the comment after being asked if the Christmas Day strikes were part of a broader campaign.

item.title: The continued mysteries surrounding the intelligence operation to capture Maduro
item.description: From intelligence sources to intricate mission plans, some details are becoming clearer - but many questions remain unanswered.
